patthana15.68:4.1: Niyataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naniyato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.68:4.2: Aniyataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naniyato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.68:5.1: Niyataṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naniyato naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.68:5.2: Aniyataṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naniyato naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
